title: Chainlink External Adapter for Synthetix-debt-pool
description: The Synthetix debt pool adapter fetches the total debt from the DebtCache contract.The environment variables bellow are not required to start the adapter but are required when you want to pull the debt from that chain. Not setting any will not prevent the adapter from starting but it won't be able to pull debt from any chains.

CHAIN_ID.description: Ethereum blockchain id to connect to

KOVAN_CHAIN_ID.description: Kovan blockchain id to connect to

GOERLI_CHAIN_ID.description: Goerli blockchain id to connect to

OPTIMISM_CHAIN_ID.description: Optimism blockchain id to connect to

KOVAN_OPTIMISM_RPC_URL.description: A valid Kovan Optimism RPC URL

KOVAN_OPTIMISM_CHAIN_ID.description: Kovan Optimism blockchain id to connect to

GOERLI_OPTIMISM_RPC_URL.description: A valid Goerli Optimism RPC URL

GOERLI_OPTIMISM_CHAIN_ID.description: Goerli Optimism blockchain id to connect to

ADDRESS_RESOLVER_PROXY_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.description: Overwrite the default Address Resolver proxy contract address

KOVAN_ADDRESS_RESOLVER_PROXY_CONTRACT_AD.description: Overwrite the default Address Resolver proxy contract address

OPTIMISM_ADDRESS_RESOLVER_PROXY_CONTRACT.description: Overwrite the default Address Resolver proxy contract address

KOVAN_OPTIMISM_ADDRESS_RESOLVER_PROXY_CO.description: Overwrite the default Address Resolver proxy contract address

GOERLI_ADDRESS_RESOLVER_PROXY_CONTRACT_A.description: Overwrite the default Address Resolver proxy contract address
